'''12w30c''' is the seventeenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.3.1]], released on July 24, 2012<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120727014226/https://www.mojang.com/2012/07/minecraft-snapshot-12w30c/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 12w30c|website=Mojang.com|date=July 24, 2012}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[12w30a]] and [[12w30b]] snapshots.

== Changes ==
* Removed 2&times;2 crafting grid from the Survival inventory tab in [[Creative]] mode.

== Fixes ==
'''5 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed [[piston]] block animation bug.
* Fixed [[rain]] particles in certain [[biome]]s.
* Fixed [[monster spawner]]s set to spawn FallingSand entity crashing the game.
* Fixed minor text bugs.
* Fixed portal placement.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This is the first ever "c" snapshot.
